name: Thoughts and Emotions
description: Save Greg from being hugged. Why should you do that? Greg is a balloon and cacti are trying to hug him. You've got a gun, I think you know what to do. Made by Havesomeslav for the Low Effort Jam 6 (https://itch.io/jam/low-effort-jam-6) the theme of which was cactus. Have fun.
